issue.title: [Rust] more consistent naming in array builders
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4172](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4172). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
in array builder, we sometimes use `push` for adding elements to the array, while sometimes use `append`. Primitive array builders are called, for instance, `Int32Builder`, while builder for list is called `ListArrayBuilder`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4172?focusedCommentId=16737664) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3345
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3345>
